#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int a[n],count=0,max=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
        }
        for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]==a[i+1])
            {
                count++;
                if(max<count)
                    max=count;
            }
            else
                count=0;
        }
        cout<<max<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
